description: [Emotet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0367) has leveraged the Admin$, C$, and IPC$ shares for lateral movement. (Citation: Malwarebytes Emotet Dec 2017)(Citation: Binary Defense Emotes Wi-Fi Spreader)

external_references.description: Binary Defense. (n.d.). Emotet Evolves With new Wi-Fi Spreader. Retrieved September 8, 2023.
Smith, A.. (2017, December 22). Protect your network from Emotet Trojan with Malwarebytes Endpoint Security. Retrieved January 17, 2019.
